author: ryan
msg: SOLR-215 -- removing the core name and 'cores' registry stuff.  this should be part of SOLR-350, not SolrCore

author: rolandw
msg: HTTPCORE-115: added comment about interpretation of Transfer-Encoding header

author: dos
msg: add --cs_max_retries mass-check option to limit the number of times a message
will be retried; keeps mass-check server from dying if archive iterator has
some sort of error with a message (like it's been removed from the corpus);
use --noisy to find out which messages are being skipped; no change in
functionality if you don't use the --cs_max_retries option

author: ryan
msg: SOLR-215 -- removing static references to "instanceDir" -- this will let each core have its own instanceDir and ClassLoader
